items.sentence: I tell everyone that I can\'t speak French, even though I can.
Tom told me that he heard something, but he wasn\'t sure what.
Tom tried to cut the meat, but his knife wasn\'t sharp enough.
You can\'t help Tom tomorrow because you have to work all day.
Tom says that he plans on staying in Boston as long as he can.
Tom\'s French pronunciation isn\'t as good as he thinks it is.
I can get us some tickets to Tom\'s concert if you want to go.
Tom and Mary know each other, but they\'re not really friends.
Tom and Mary probably did something they shouldn\'t have done.
Tom wondered how many more people could fit into the elevator.
